objective: Analyze observability data from Grafana stack (Loki, Mimir, Tempo) to identify system health issues and generate monitoring insights
steps: - Query Grafana Loki for log analysis and error pattern detection
- Retrieve metrics from Grafana Mimir to analyze system performance trends
- Examine distributed traces from Grafana Tempo for request flow analysis
- Identify anomalies in error rates, response times, and resource utilization
- Correlate logs, metrics, and traces to pinpoint root causes of issues
- Calculate service level indicators (SLI) and service level objectives (SLO) compliance
- Generate recommendations for improving system observability and performance
- Compile findings into comprehensive observability health report
guardrails: - Define SLI/SLO thresholds for error rates, latency, and availability
- Include specific details for each identified issue: Service, Issue Type, Severity, Root Cause, Recommendation
- Focus on issues that impact system reliability and user experience
